rows.label: qst700204_msg0001
rows.name:
Prototype #1 and #2!
They're both done, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0002
rows.name:
I'll have that child try them on
right away, so I want you customers
to choose which hat is better, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0003
rows.name: Huh? Us?

rows.label: qst700204_msg0004
rows.name:
But, is that okay? When it comes to
business, we're complete amateurs.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0005
rows.name: It's fine, mo.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0006
rows.name:
You were the first ones to talk
to me when I was in trouble, mo.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0007
rows.name:
So, I want you customers to
decide on this new product, mo.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0008
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0009
rows.name: All right! In that case, we'll accept!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0010
rows.name:
Okay, first up is the
cute knit hat, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0011
rows.name: How is it, mo? Does it look good, mo?

rows.label: qst700204_msg0012
rows.name: Okay, next up is the casual cap, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0013
rows.name:
This one is cool too, mo!
It'll definitely be popular
with the Nopon, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0014
rows.name: Well then, customers...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0015
rows.name:
I want you to decide which one
will be the new product, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0401
rows.name:
Which hat will be adopted
as the new product?

rows.label: qst700204_msg0402
rows.name: The knit hat

rows.label: qst700204_msg0403
rows.name: The cap with pom-poms

rows.label: qst700204_msg0101
rows.name:
Roger, mo! Then the new product
will be this knit hat, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0201
rows.name:
Roger, mo! Then the new product
will be this cap here, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0301
rows.name:
Dekudeku will go out into the city
like this and research the reactions
of the people in the capital, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0302
rows.name:
Shopkeeper-san, please make a lot
of these hats in the meantime, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0303
rows.name: Momo!? It's so popular, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0304
rows.name:
In no time at all, Nopon wanting
the new hat came flooding in, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0305
rows.name:
With this, we're sure to
make a huge profit, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0306
rows.name: Thank you so, so much, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0307
rows.name: Heh, not bad at all.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0308
rows.name:
Yeah, being a member of the Voltis
Trade Guild at that age is no joke.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0309
rows.name: Hmph... This is nothing yet, mo.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0310
rows.name:
Since Dekudeku is producing,
I'll make this shop the number
one in all of Iira, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0311
rows.name:
Right, right. Then from now
on, you two get along...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0312
rows.name:
...And for that to happen, you need
to put on some clothes first, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0313
rows.name: Momo!? P-Please spare me that, mo!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0314
rows.name: Er...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0315
rows.name:
The shop is thriving, so
let's take our leave...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0316
rows.name: Agreed.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0317
rows.name: No objections.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0318
rows.name:
This time, it's not the shop,
I need you to save Obibi, mo!
